text: Neuzheli zhe oni poklonyayutsya pomimo Nego drugim bogam? Skazhi [, Mukhammad]: "Privedite vashi dovody [v pol'zu vashikh bogov]! Etot [Koran] - nazidaniye moim sovremennikam, a [soderzhashchiyesya v nem skazaniya o prorokakh] - nazidaniye tem, kto zhil do menya". Odnako bol'shaya chast' mnogobozhnikov i predstavleniya ne imeyet ob istine, [boleye togo,] oni otvergayut yeye
